analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0xa4f74f8f3ec758033cdb7b3e8df053efdf717362.sol:
	Contract TossToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0xa4f74f8f3ec758033cdb7b3e8df053efdf717362.sol#212)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/21/0xa4f74f8f3ec758033cdb7b3e8df053efdf717362.sol#82) is not in mixedCase
